reports_start_date.title: Reports replication start date
reports_start_date.description: The start date from which to begin replicating report data. Any data generated before this date will not be replicated in reports. This is a UTC date in YYYY-MM-DD format.

hourly_reports.title: Enable hourly-aggregate reports
hourly_reports.description: Toggle this to enable replicating reports aggregated using an hourly time window. More information about report aggregation can be found in the docs.

daily_reports.title: Enable daily-aggregate reports
daily_reports.description: Toggle this to enable replicating reports aggregated using a daily time window. More information about report aggregation can be found in the docs.

weekly_reports.title: Enable weekly-aggregate reports
weekly_reports.description: Toggle this to enable replicating reports aggregated using a weekly time window running from Sunday to Saturday. More information about report aggregation can be found in the docs.

monthly_reports.title: Enable monthly-aggregate reports
monthly_reports.description: Toggle this to enable replicating reports aggregated using a monthly time window. More information about report aggregation can be found in the docs.
